(367x1+0)/1 mod 1024 = 367. (367x3+1)/2 mod 512 = 39. (367x9+5)/4 mod 256 = 59. (367x27+19)/8 mod 128 = 89. (367x81+65)/16 mod 64 = 6. (367x81+65)/32 mod 32 = 3. (367x243+227)/64 mod 16 = 5. (367x729+745)/128 mod 8 = 0. (367x729+745)/256 mod 4 = 0. (367x729+745)/512 mod 2 = 0. (367x729+745)/1024 mod 1 = 0.
